data.rewards_program_description: Earn 5x points on travel purchased through Chase Travel℠, 3x points on dining, select streaming services, and online groceries, 2x points on other travel purchases, and 1x points on all other purchases. Points are worth 25% more when redeemed through Chase Travel portal (1.25 cents per point). 10% anniversary points bonus included.
data.rewards_expiration_detail: Points don't expire while account remains open
data.rewards_redemption_options: Can transfer points 1:1 to travel partners including major airlines and hotels. Redeem through Chase Travel portal for 25% more value. Other options include cash back, gift cards, and merchandise.
data.alternative_payment_plans: My Chase Plan available - allows installment payments on purchases $100+ with monthly fee up to 1.72% of transaction amount. Terms 3-18 months available.

benefits.benefit_description: $50 annual hotel credit for bookings through Chase Travel portal

incentives.incentive_description: 60,000 bonus points after spending $4,000 in first 3 months
